title: The Quest for Diagnostic Excellence in the Emergency Department
details: MS Pulia, D Papanagnou, P Croskerry - Joint Commission Journal on Quality and …, 2024
abstract: Timely and accurate diagnosis is a foundational element of all medical care. The emergency department (ED) is a high stakes care setting where a substantial portion of initial diagnostic assessments and nearly all emergent diagnosis occurs. Thus, it …
